Entries.59021001/f Elliott 1250/w sunny/t 2200 2: moonlightJellies/12 38/farmer 11 30 2 Elliott 13 38 1/skippable/pause 1500/move farmer 0 8 1/pause 500/faceDirection Elliott 3/speak Elliott "Oh, hello, @.$0#$b#What a pleasant surprise.$1"/pause 800/faceDirection Elliott 2/pause 700/faceDirection farmer 2/pause 800/speak Elliott "The ocean makes one feel relaxed, don't you think?$0"/pause 500/speak Elliott "When I have too many things on my mind, I like to take a walk by the sea.$0"/pause 950/emote Elliott 40/pause 800/faceDirection farmer 1/pause 650/emote farmer 8/pause 800/faceDirection Elliott 3/pause 700/speak Elliott "Truth is... I'm glad you came by today.$0"/pause 600/speak Elliott "You know I moved here not so long ago.$0"/pause 700/speak Elliott "To become a writer, I felt that I needed to go far away from home, that I needed to explore the world.$0"/pause 700/speak Elliott "I must admit that at first I regretted it a little...$3#$b#It was hard to leave everything behind, I missed my parents and friends.$3"/pause 700/speak Elliott "But not long after you moved to Pelican Town too, @.$0#$b#It was really inspiring to see you working hard on the farm.$1"/pause 700/speak Elliott "You helped me a lot, even if you didn’t notice.$0"/pause 700/emote farmer 32/pause 700/speak Elliott "Well... It’s getting late, we should be leaving by now.$0"/pause 500/speak Elliott "It was a pleasure talking to you, @.$1"/pause 900/end

Entries.59021002/f Jas 500/f Vincent 500/w sunny: summer3/40 13/farmer 1000 1000 2 Jas 40 11 2 Vincent 54 13 3/skippable/animate Jas false true 120 16 17 18 19/pause 1600/move Vincent -14 0 0/pause 700/stopAnimation Jas/pause 500/speak Vincent "Hi, Jas!$1"/pause 600/speak Jas "Hello, Vincent.$0"/pause 500/speak Jas "What are you doing here?$3#$b#I thought you had an extra class with Miss Penny today.$3"/pause 600/speak Vincent "Yeah, I had.$0#$b#But I finished all the exercises so my mom let me come here and play with you.$1"/pause 500/emote Jas 32/pause 600/speak Jas "Okay, then what do you want to do?$0#$b#We could play in the river like we did last week.$4"/pause 600/speak Vincent "Actually, Sam told me he found a Rainbow Shell at the beach the other day.$0#$b#But he couldn't pick it up...$2#$b#I've never seen one and he said it was really pretty, so I want to go search for it.$0"/pause 600/speak Jas "Uhm... I don't know.$3#$b#Today I have to go to bed earlier...$3"/pause 600/emote Vincent 28/pause 500/speak Vincent "Oh, come on Jas.$2#$b#I swear it'll be fun!$3"/pause 600/speak Vincent "We could also show it to Miss Penny.$0"/pause 600/speak Jas "Okay, okay, I'll go with you.$0#$b#Just let me tell Aunt Marnie, I'll be right back.$0"/pause 500/emote Vincent 32/pause 800/end

Entries.59021003/f Pam 500/f Gus 500/t 2000 2100: Saloon1/8 19/farmer 11 20 0 Clint 1 22 2 Emily 14 18 2 Leah 2 20 1 Elliott 5 20 3 Pierre 9 22 1 Pam 7 18 1 Gus 9 18 3/skippable/pause 1700/speak Pam "Gus, let me tell you something...$4"/pause 500/emote Gus 8/pause 800/speak Pam "This is the best Glazed Yams I've ever eaten on my entire life.$1"/pause 600/speak Gus "Oh, you had me for a second, Pam.$1"/pause 500/speak Gus "I'm glad you liked it, lately Pierre has been selling great quality stuff.$0#$b#I think he has been buying from the new farmer, @.$0"/pause 700/speak Pam "@...$0#$b#That kid sure is hardworking.$0"/pause 600/speak Pam "*sigh* I ain't got that young energy anymore.$2"/pause 700/speak Gus "Come on, Pam, we're still young.$0"/pause 500/emote Pam 40/pause 700/speak Gus "Okay... Entries.59021004/f George 2000/t 1600 1700: desolate/15 18/farmer 1000 200 0 George 18 17 0/skippable/pause 1500/playSound doorOpen/pause 150/warp farmer 9 24/faceDirection farmer 0/pause 350/move farmer 0 -5 1/move farmer 5 0 0/move farmer 0 -2 1/move farmer 3 0 1/pause 350/emote George 16/pause 700/faceDirection George 3/pause 700/speak George "Oh, it's you, @.$0"/pause 500/speak George "I didn't hear you.$0#$b#You know I'm already an old man...$2"/pause 500/emote George 28/pause 700/emote farmer 8/pause 750/speak George "I was looking at this photo album.$0"/pause 750/speak George "Time flies fast, @...#$b#When I was your age, I was full of dreams.$0"/pause 750/speak George "Evelyn and I had just got married and we were looking for a house to raise our family.$1"/pause 750/speak George "I remember when we moved here. Not long after she told me she was pregnant.$1#$b#Look, here’s a picture of us at the time.$1"/pause 800/speak George "Those were the happiest days of my life.$1"/pause 800/speak George "But then Clara passed away...$2#$b#It was really hard for both of us, she was our only daughter...$2#$b#Also, Alex was still young and needed his mother.$2"/pause 900/speak George "Oh, but don’t worry about this old man.$0#$b#I was lucky to have Evelyn by my side.$0"/pause 700/speak George "She has always been so strong and beautiful...$1"/pause 800/speak George "I hope you can find someone like her someday, @.$1"/pause 500/emote farmer 20/pause 1000/end

Entries.59021006/f Sebastian 750 Robin 750/z sum: sadpiano/6 8/Sebastian 11 9 2 Robin 1000 2000 0 farmer 1500 200 0/skippable/pause 1800/speak Robin "Sebastian, dinner is ready!$0"/pause 80/emote Sebastian 12/pause 1000/speak Robin "Sebastian?$0#$b#Did you hear me?$0"/pause 850/playSound doorOpen/pause 150/warp Robin 1 4/faceDirection Robin 2/pause 500/speak Robin "Are you there, Sebastian?$0"/pause 350/move Robin 0 2 1/move Robin 5 0 2/move Robin 0 3 1/move Robin 3 0 1/pause 350/speak Robin "Sebastian, are you okay? Did you fell asleep?$2"/pause 700/faceDirection Sebastian 3/pause 500/speak Sebastian "...$5"/pause 390/emote Robin 16/pause 600/speak Robin "Your face is bright red, Sebastian!$2"/pause 500/speak Robin "Why didn't you tell me you were sick?$2#$b#I'll go upstairs and tell Maru to bring some medicines for you...$2"/pause 500/speak Sebastian "Ugh...$5#$b#Please just leave me alone...$5"/pause 600/speak Robin "How could I leave you alone?$2#$b#You're my son and you're sick!$2"/pause 500/speak Sebastian "I just don't want your help, I'm okay...$5"/pause 500/emote Robin 12/pause 600/speak Robin "For the love of Yoba, you're clearly not okay.$2"/pause 500/speak Robin "Look, I know things aren't going well lately.$2#$b#But I'm still your mother and I care about you.$2"/pause 500/speak Robin "So I'm going to take care of you even if you don't want me to.$5"/pause 700/speak Sebastian "...$5#$b#Okay...$5"/pause 500/speak Robin "Great, then wait here and I'll be right back, okay?$0"/pause 1200/end

Entries.59021007/e 719926/f Caroline 1750/t 1100: spring_day_ambient/5 8/Caroline 5 7 2 farmer 1500 200 0 Marnie 4 8 1 Robin 6 8 3 Jodi 5 9 0/skippable/pause 1000/speak Caroline "So what do you think about the sunroom?$1"/pause 500/speak Jodi "It's so beautiful, Caroline!$1#$b#It's so relaxing to be in here.$0"/pause 600/speak Marnie "I wish I had a room like this at the Ranch, but I don't think there's enough space.$0"/pause 600/speak Robin "I could build you a sunroom easily, Marnie.$1"/pause 600/speak Caroline "There's no need for that, you can come here anytime you want.$0"/pause 600/speak Caroline "We could also have dinner, it's been a long time since we last spent some time together.$0"/pause 600/speak Jodi "That'd be really nice.$0#$b#Lately I've been working too much, sometimes it's hard to take care of the boys...$0"/pause 600/speak Robin "I think we all deserve a break, how about next Saturday?$1"/pause 600/speak Marnie "Sounds good, I'll bring some fresh cheese for you.$1"/pause 500/speak Caroline "It's all set then.$1"/pause 500/speak Caroline "Let's drink a cup of tea, I just bought some yesterday. You're going to love it.$1"/pause 500/emote Caroline 32/pause 1200/end

Entries.59021008/e 16/f Pierre 2500/z summer/t 1: breezy/6 19/Pierre 4 17 2 farmer 1500 200 0 Lewis 12 23 0 Elliott 2 22 3 Evelyn 9 26 1/skippable/pause 800/playSound doorOpen/warp farmer 6 29/faceDirection farmer 0/move farmer 0 -7 0/pause 200/emote Pierre 16/pause 350/speak Pierre "There you are, @!$1#$b#I was waiting for you to come.$0"/pause 350/emote farmer 8/pause 600/speak Pierre "Come here, I wanted to talk to you about something.$0"/pause 380/move farmer 0 -2 3/move farmer -2 0 0/move farmer 0 -1 0/pause 600/speak Pierre "You see... Do you remember the 'incident' we had not long ago?$4"/pause 500/speak Pierre "You know, when you found out about my secret...$4"/pause 700/speak Pierre "Well, after you left, I thought about it and realised I was so wrong...$2"/pause 700/speak Pierre "Caroline is my wife and I shouldn't hide anything from her...$2"/pause 700/speak Pierre "So I'm going to tell her about it tonight and wanted to ask you for a favor.$0"/pause 500/speak Pierre "I was wondering if you had some Summer Spangles you could sell me.$0"/pause 500/speak Pierre "I know it isn't summer, but Caroline loves them and I wanted to compensate her somehow.$0"/pause 500/emote farmer 60/pause 700/speak Pierre "Oh, you don't have any?$2"/pause 600/speak Pierre "Well, it's okay, I have a plan B!$1"/pause 500/speak Pierre "This morning Willy came by and sold me some fresh Tuna, so I'll cook Fish Tacos for dinner.$1"/pause 700/speak Pierre "You can come over if you want, Abigail would love to see you.$0"/pause 500/emote farmer 32/pause 700/speak Pierre "We'll be waiting for you!$1"/pause 1200/end

Entries.59021009/f Haley 1250/f Emily 1250/t 140: EmilyTheme/20 18/farmer 1500 200 0 Emily 18 18 1 Haley 22 18 3/skippable/pause 1800/speak Haley "Hey, Emily...$7"/pause 600/speak Emily "Yes, what's wrong Haley?$0"/pause 600/speak Haley "I was just thinking...$7"/pause 500/speak Haley "Will mom and dad come back soon?$2"/pause 600/speak Emily "Oh...$6#$b#Well, I don't know.$3#$b#At first they said it was just going to be a couple of months, but it looks like they're having a great time.$3"/pause 500/speak Emily "And now two years have passed...$3"/pause 600/emote Haley 28/pause 700/speak Haley "Don't you miss them?$2#$b#It feels weird not having them around for so long...$2"/pause 500/speak Haley "They were kind of annoying sometimes, but it'd be so nice to see them.$2"/pause 500/emote Emily 60/pause 700/speak Emily "I also miss them some days.$2"/pause 700/speak Emily "Listen... Why don't we call them?$1#$b#They should be at the hotel right now.$0"/pause 500/emote Haley 16/pause 700/speak Haley "Great idea! I'll go grab my phone.$1"/pause 350/emote Emily 32/pause 1200/end

Entries.59021010/f Penny 750/f Maru 750/t 1700 1: libraryTheme/6 11/farmer 13 9 0 Elliott 16 9 0 Maru 1000 1000 2 Penny 10 11 3/skippable/pause 1500/playSound doorOpen/pause 100/warp Maru 3 15/faceDirection Maru 0/pause 800/emote Maru 8/pause 700/move Maru 0 -5 0/pause 500/speak Maru "Gunther?$0#$b#Are you there?$0"/faceDirection Penny 2/move Penny 0 3 3/move Penny -3 0 0/move Penny 0 -4 3/move Penny -2 0 3/pause 200/speak Penny "Hello, Maru.$0#$b#I heard you're looking for Gunther.$0"/pause 500/faceDirection Maru 1/pause 300/speak Penny "He went to see Mayor Lewis and I don't know when he'll be back.$0"/pause 600/speak Maru "Really?$0#$b#Oh, I wanted to ask him about a book...$2"/pause 500/speak Maru "Well, thank you Penny.$0#$b#I'll have to come back tomorrow.$0"/pause 600/faceDirection Maru 2/pause 250/speak Penny "Wait!$3"/pause 500/faceDirection Maru 1/pause 250/emote Maru 8/pause 600/speak Penny "Maybe I can help you.$0#$b#The Museum is my second home after all.$1"/pause 600/speak Maru "That'd be great!$1"/pause 500/speak Maru "I'm looking for a medical book.$0#$b#Harvey recommended me to read it.$0"/pause 600/speak Penny "Oh, medical books are right here, come with me.$1"/pause 500/faceDirection Penny 1/move Penny 3 0 1/move Maru 3 0 2/move Maru 0 1 1/move Maru 2 0 1/pause 500/speak Penny "Here they are.$0#$b#They're arranged by alphabetical order, so it shouldn't be difficult to find it.$0"/pause 500/emote Maru 32/pause 650/speak Maru "Great, I'll search for it myself.$0#$b#Thanks again Penny.$1"/pause 500/speak Penny "No problem!$1"/pause 1100/end

Entries.59021011/f Abigail 1250/f Sam 1250/f Lea: poppy/44 23/farmer 1000 1000 0 Abigail 44 23 2 Sam 45 23 2 Leah 44 11 2/skippable/pause 1500/speak Abigail "It's such a shame Seb didn't come with us today.$0"/pause 500/speak Sam "Yeah, right?$0#$b#The weather is so nice, I'm dying to go swimming.$1"/move Leah 0 10 2/pause 250/speak Leah "Hey, guys!$1"/pause 300/faceDirection Abigail 0/faceDirection Sam 0/speak Leah "Enjoying the sun, huh?$1"/pause 500/speak Sam "Hey, Leah.$1#$b#That's right, we were just about to get in.$0"/pause 250/speak Sam "Why don't you join us?$1"/pause 500/speak Leah "Oh, I was planning on making some sketches.$0#$b#Inspire myself a bit, you know?$0"/pause 300/emote Abigail 16/pause 600/speak Abigail "Did you bring your sketchbook?$0#$b#I love your paintings and would love to see some.$1"/pause 500/emote Leah 32/pause 650/speak Leah "Of course, no problem.$1"/pause 500/playSound backpackIN/pause 150/move Leah 0 1 2/showFrame Leah 35/pause 500/speak Leah "Look, I painted this one last winter, when Vincent and Jas were playing near my house.$0"/pause 600/speak Abigail "This is amazing, Leah.$1"/pause 500/speak Sam "Yeah, you got the talent.$1"/pause 500/showFrame Leah 0/pause 150/emote Leah 32/pause 600/speak Leah "Hey, why don't you both get into the water?$0#$b#I can draw something for you, after all I came here to practice.$1"/pause 500/speak Sam "Really? That'd be awesome.$1"/pause 350/emote Abigail 32/pause 1200/end

Entries.59020031/f Elliott 500/f Leah 500/d Mon: Saloon1/9 20/farmer 18 20 0 Willy 17 22 2 Pam 7 18 1 Clint 19 23 3 Lewis 8 22 1 Marnie 7 22 3 Emily 10 18 2 Gus 14 18 2 Elliott 4 19 2 Leah 2 20 1/skippable/animate Gus false true 250 18 19 20/animate Lewis false true 150 19 19 19 19 19 19 19 19 19 19 19 19 19 19 22 23 23 23/animate Marnie false true 150 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 21 22 22 23 23/pause 2800/speak Elliott "Do you want another drink, Leah?$0"/pause 900/speak Leah "That would be nice.$1"/pause 800/faceDirection Elliott 1/pause 390/speak Elliott "Bartender!$0#$b#Please bring another glass of wine for the lady.$0"/pause 300/stopAnimation Gus/pause 390/faceDirection Gus 3/pause 280/speak Gus "Coming!$0"/pause 600/move Gus 0 -1 1/move Gus 3 0 0/pause 280/playSound Milking/pause 1200/move Gus -11 0 2/move Gus 0 3 3/move Gus -1 0 3/pause 350/speak Gus "Here you go.$0"/pause 80/playSound dwoop/pause 500/speak Leah "Thank you, Gus.$0"/pause 650/move Gus 1 0 0/move Gus 0 -3 1/move Gus 8 0 2/move Gus 0 1 2/pause 100/animate Gus false true 250 18 19 20/pause 800/faceDirection Elliott 2/pause 1000/speak Elliott "Well, how are you doing these days?$0#$b#Is your art going well?$0"/pause 780/speak Leah "...$2#$b#*sigh* Not really...$2"/pause 800/speak Elliott "Oh... How so?$2"/pause 850/speak Leah "Well...$2#$b#When I moved here, I thought the rural life would keep me inspired all the time, but it turns out that isn't the case...$2"/pause 680/speak Leah "Also, I've having a hard time focusing lately...$2"/pause 1200/speak Leah "Am I even a real artist...?$2"/pause 380/emote Leah 28/pause 680/speak Leah "Elliott, you understand what I'm saying, right?$3"/pause 850/speak Elliott "Leah, don't even think about doubting your talent as an artist.$7"/pause 720/speak Elliott "I remember the day you first showed me a painting of yours.$0"/pause 720/speak Elliott "I could see the passion in your eyes.$0#$b#You are and will always be an artist, Leah.$0"/pause 390/emote Leah 60/pause 850/speak Elliott "You just need some time to clear your mind.$0#$b#I also feel uninspired some days, it's natural.$0"/pause 800/speak Elliott "But I am fortunate to live next to the sea.$0#$b#The ocean stirs the heart and inspires the imagination.$1"/pause 950/speak Elliott "Perhaps you should come by the beach sometime.$0#$b#Don't you have a watercolor box? You could bring it with you and try to reflect the beauty of the ocean.$0"/pause 950/speak Elliott "Oh, and it'll be my pleasure to invite you to my house afterwards and have a glass of wine together.$1"/pause 800/speak Leah "That sounds great.$1"/pause 750/speak Leah "I'll make sure to bring a salad made of fresh vegetables.$0#$b#You know, I'm pretty good at foraging.$1"/pause 390/emote Elliott 32/pause 2100/end dialogue Leah "Elliott really understands the struggles of being an artist.$0"

Entries.59020017/f Haley 500/f Leah 500/w sunny/: 50s/94 39/farmer 1000 1000 2 Haley 93 39 2 Leah 104 33 0/skippable/animate Haley false true 280 30 30 30 30 30 31 24 24 24 24 24 27 27 27 27 27 24 31/pause 1800/playSound doorClose/move Leah 0 2 3/move Leah -6 0 2/pause 1000/move Leah 0 4 3/move Leah -3 0 3/pause 600/speak Leah "Hi, Haley!$1#$b#Taking some pictures, huh?$1"/pause 500/stopAnimation Haley/showFrame Haley 33/pause 600/speak Haley "Oh, hello, Leah.$7#$b#Yes, the forest is a good photographic setting.$0"/pause 600/speak Leah "Yeah, I also like to walk along the river to search for inspiration.$0"/pause 700/speak Haley "Oh, that's right, you were a painter or something, right?$0"/pause 600/speak Leah "Yes, I am.$1#$b#I also do some sculpting.$0"/pause 500/speak Leah "Actually, when I was in high school I was interested in photography.$0#$b#But my photos were more mediocre than anything else...$2"/pause 500/speak Leah "So now I'm focusing on painting and sculpting.$0"/pause 500/speak Leah "I bet your photos are better than mine ever were.$1"/pause 680/speak Haley "Oh, don't think that mine are impressive either.$0#$b#It's just a hobby of mine.$0"/pause 700/speak Leah "Let me see...$0"/pause 200/move Leah 0 -1 3/move Leah -2 0 2/pause 1000/emote Leah 40/pause 800/speak Leah "Come on, Haley! These are incredible!$1"/pause 600/speak Leah "I love how you play with light in this one.$1#$b#And the composition in this one is simple but very well done.$1"/pause 800/speak Haley "Really? Do you mean it?$1"/pause 600/speak Leah "Of course!$1#$b#You could be a professional photographer if you wanted.$0"/pause 500/emote Haley 32/pause 390/move Leah 2 0 2/move Leah 0 1 3/pause 600/speak Leah "Actually, I want to ask you a favor, Haley.$0"/pause 500/speak Leah "I've been running low on ideas lately...$2#$b#And I could really use some references.$0#$b#I love your pictures, so I was hoping that you could lend me some of them.$0"/pause 500/speak Leah "What do you think?$1"/pause 500/emote Haley 16/pause 500/speak Haley "Nobody has ever been so interested in my photography.$1#$b#I'll gladly give you all the photos you want.$1"/pause 500/speak Leah "Thank you so much, Haley!$1"/pause 500/speak Leah "I have to leave now.$0#$b#You can come by whenever you want, I'm usually at home.$0"/pause 500/speak Leah "Bye, Haley. I'll be waiting for you.$1"/pause 600/speak Haley "See you soon, Leah!$1"/pause 500/move Leah 3 0 0/move Leah 0 -10 0/pause 500/end dialogue Leah "Have you seen Haley's photos?$0#$b#They are amazing!$1"

You seem down...$8"/pause 850/speak Harvey "Oh...$2#$b#...it's my radio.$2"/pause 500/speak Harvey "I like to track the planes that fly over Stardew Valley.$0"/pause 500/speak Harvey "It may sound weird, but it's my hobby.$0#$b#When I was a kid, I always dreamed of being a pilot.$1"/pause 750/speak Harvey "And, well, the radio I use for it is not working.$2"/pause 390/speak Harvey "I was trying to fix it, but I don't know what's wrong.$2"/pause 780/speak Maru "A radio, you said?$0#$b#Maybe I can help you.$1"/pause 650/speak Maru "You know, I have a workshop where I build and fix all kinds of machines.$0"/pause 680/speak Harvey "Really? I would owe you a big one, Maru.$1"/pause 700/speak Maru "Yeah, let me see...$0"/pause 700/move Maru -1 0 0/move Maru 0 -1 0/move Maru -2 0 0/move Maru 0 -2 1/faceDirection Harvey 3/pause 850/speak Maru "Okay...$0"/pause 500/animate Maru false true 150 16 17 18 20 22 23/pause 100/playSound clank/playSound clank/pause 50/playSound clank/playSound clank/playSound clank/pause 150/playSound clank/playSound clank/playSound clank/pause 80/playSound clank/pause 200/playSound clank/pause 180/playSound clank/playSound clank/playSound clank/pause 3000/stopAnimation Maru 16/pause 500/speak Maru "Looks like some cables were connected wrong.$0#$b#Try it now, Dr. Harvey.$0"/pause 580/showFrame Maru 16/pause 80/showFrame Maru 24/move Harvey -2 0 0/pause 280/showFrame Harvey 23/pause 200/move Maru 0 2 1/move Maru 3 0 0/move Maru 0 -1 3/pause 800/emote Harvey 16/pause 500/speak Harvey "It's actually working!$10"/pause 380/speak Harvey "I can't believe it.$9#$b#I've been trying to figure out what's wrong all morning and you come here and fix it in just a couple minutes.$9"/pause 850/speak Harvey "You're incredible, Maru.$1"/pause 700/speak Maru "You're too kind, Dr. Harvey.$1"/pause 600/speak Maru "It's nothing, really.$0#$b#I'm used to things not working properly so it was easy for me.$1"/pause 650/speak Harvey "Anyway, thank you again, Maru.$1"/pause 580/speak Harvey "As a show of gratitude, I'll gift you a pack of energy tonic.$1"/pause 600/emote Maru 32/pause 1300/end dialogue Harvey "Is there anything Maru can't do?$0#$e#I don't think there is.$1"

Entries.59021012/k 191393 502261/f Linus 1500/f: nightTime/107 57/Linus 109 56 1 Shane -100 -100 0 farmer -200 -500 0/skippable/changeSprite Shane JojaMart/animate Linus false true 500 20 21/pause 1000/playSound trashcanlid/pause 1000/playSound dirtyHit/pause 1000/playSound slimeHit/pause 1000/playSound dirtyHit/pause 500/playSound doorOpen/pause 50/warp Shane 96 51/faceDirection Shane 2/playSound dirtyHit/pause 150/speak Shane "...?$3"/pause 200/playSound slimeHit/move Shane 0 5 1/playSound dirtyHit/move Shane 11 0 1/pause 100/stopAnimation Linus/showFrame Linus 22/jump Linus/shake Linus 1000/pause 800/showFrame Linus 12/pause 350/speak Shane "Oh, hey.$0#$b#You're Linus right?$0"/pause 380/shake Linus 1000/emote Linus 28/pause 500/speak Shane "You don't have to worry about me.$0#$b#I won't say I saw you here, it's none of my business."/pause 800/speak Linus "Really?$3"/pause 600/speak Linus "Thank you then...$0#$b#I'll leave now.$0"/pause 350/faceDirection Linus 2/pause 200/emote Shane 16/pause 200/speak Shane "Wait...$3"/pause 600/emote Linus 8/pause 500/faceDirection Linus 3/pause 800/speak Shane "Actually...$0#$b#Joja wastes a lot of food everyday.$0"/pause 700/speak Shane "They always overstock and end up throwing away many things.$0"/pause 600/speak Shane "Morris told me dump some things today.$0#$b#I don't even know why, because they're perfectly fine.$0"/pause 600/speak Shane "So, you know...$0#$b#If you want some we could go inside, no one is going to know.$1"/pause 600/emote Linus 32/pause 1200/end

Entries.59021013/f Demetrius 1000/f Harvey 1000/: continue/7 15/farmer -200 -500 0 Demetrius 1000 1000 2 Harvey 6 15 2/skippable/pause 1500/playSound doorOpen/warp Demetrius 10 19/faceDirection Demetrius 0/move Demetrius 0 -1 3/move Demetrius -4 0 0/move Demetrius 0 -1 0/pause 700/speak Harvey "Hello, Demetrius.$0#$b#Have you come to see Maru?$0"/pause 500/speak Harvey "Oh, right, she doesn't work today.$0#$b#And it looks like you don't have any appointments.$0"/pause 700/speak Demetrius "You see, I came because I needed your help with something.$0"/pause 700/emote Harvey 8/pause 500/speak Demetrius "Yesterday I was analyzing this Mushroom sample and it has some dark spots that I can't identify.$0"/pause 600/speak Demetrius "I asked Maru but she didn't know either, and told me maybe you could help.$0"/pause 600/speak Demetrius "So if you have a couple of minutes I'd appreciate if you could take a look at it.$0"/pause 700/speak Harvey "Well, I'm not an expert but I quite like studying mushrooms.$0#b#Maybe I can be of help.$1"/pause 600/speak Harvey "There aren't many patients today, so we could go to the back, I have all the equipment there.$0"/pause 600/emote Demetrius 32/pause 1500/end

Entries.59021014/f Abigail 1000/f Emily 1000/f S: spirits_eve/47 88/farmer 1000 1000 0 Abigail 47 87 2 Sam 47 89 0 Sebastian 46 89 0 Emily 1000 -1000 0/skippable/addLantern 735 47 88 1/specificTemporarySprite abbyGraveyard/pause 1800/speak Abigail "Now that everyone is here, we can start with our Scary Stories Night.$1"/pause 700/speak Abigail "Today try not to run away like you did last time, Sam.$1"/pause 380/emote Sam 12/pause 500/speak Sam "What are you talking about?$5"/pause 500/speak Sam "I heard my mom calling me so I had to leave...$5"/pause 500/emote Sam 60/pause 380/animate Abigail false false 120 28 29 28 29 28 29 28 29 28 29 28 29 28 29/pause 350/speak Abigail "Okay, okay, let's get started.$0#$b#I'll go first.$0"/pause 700/speak Abigail "Many years ago, the mayor of a small town wanted to turn the graveyard into a park.$6"/pause 700/speak Abigail "So he informed everyone that they'd have move all the graves.$6"/pause 700/speak Abigail "They began to work, and once all graves were dug up it was already night.$6"/pause 700/speak Abigail "They decided to move the caskets because it was going to rain that night.$6"/pause 700/speak Abigail "And someone noticed the caskets were unusually light.$6"/pause 700/speak Abigail "So they decided to open one, and it was empty...$6"/pause 700/speak Abigail "Right at that moment, they heard some strange sounds.$6"/pause 200/playSound leafrustle/pause 50/playSound leafrustle/pause 50/playSound leafrustle/pause 280/jump Abigail/showFrame Abigail 32/shake Abigail 1000/speak Abigail "Guys, did you hear that?$7"/pause 150/showFrame Abigail 0/pause 300/speak Sebastian "Come on, Abby, stop trying to scare us.$0"/pause 380/speak Sam "Yeah, I'm not falling for it again.$3"/pause 300/speak Abigail "No, I'm serious this time! I swear I heard something.$3"/pause 150/playSound leafrustle/pause 50/playSound leafrustle/pause 100/jump Sebastian/jump Sam/shake Sebastian 1000/shake Sam 1000/pause 180/warp Emily 51 91/move Emily -4 0 0/pause 200/speak Emily "Don't worry guys, it's me, Emily.$6"/pause 200/faceDirection Sam 2/faceDirection Sebastian 2/pause 200/speak Emily "Sorry to have scared you, I just finished working and saw you here.$2"/pause 380/speak Emily "It looked fun so I stayed to hear the story...$2"/pause 600/speak Abigail "Oh, so you were the one making the sounds.$0"/pause 200/animate Abigail false false 120 28 29 28 29 28 29 28 29 28 29 28 29 28 29/showFrame Abigail 0/pause 350/speak Abigail "That was funny.$1"/pause 350/speak Emily "It was...?$2"/pause 500/speak Abigail "Yeah!$1#$b#You should have seen the faces Seb and Sam were making.$1"/pause 380/emote Sebastian 12/pause 380/speak Sebastian "Hey, you were the most scared one.$5"/pause 500/speak Abigail "Okay, okay...$1"/pause 500/speak Abigail "Well, why don't you join us, Emily?$0#$b#I'm sure you know some nice scary stories.$1"/pause 500/speak Emily "I actually do!$1"/pause 500/speak Emily "But first I want to hear the rest of yours.$0"/pause 500/emote Abigail 32/pause 350/move Emily 1 0 0/move Emily 0 -2 0/faceDirection Sam 0/faceDirection Sebastian 0/pause 1800/end

Entries.59021015/f Penny 500/f Shane 500/d Mon T: 50s/12 16/farmer 1000 1000 0 Penny -1000 1000 0 Shane 11 16 1 Marnie 20 16 0 Jas 1 7 2/skippable/pause 1600/playSound doorOpen/warp Penny 13 19/pause 250/move Penny 0 -3 3/pause 380/speak Penny "Hello, Shane.$0"/pause 700/speak Shane "... Hey.$0"/pause 500/speak Penny "I came to pick up Jas.$0"/pause 700/speak Shane "Yeah, I know. She'll be ready soon.$0"/pause 900/emote Penny 40/pause 800/speak Penny "Well... Do you want to talk?$0"/pause 500/emote Shane 8/pause 700/speak Shane "What?$0#$b#I don't think we've anything to talk about.$3"/pause 800/emote Penny 40/pause 700/speak Penny "Uhm...$0#$b#Do you like Pepper Poppers?$0"/pause 600/speak Shane "Why are you asking me that?$3"/pause 500/emote Penny 28/pause 700/speak Shane "Okay, whatever...$3#$b#Yeah, I like Pepper Poppers...$0"/pause 500/emote Penny 32/move Marnie 0 2 3/move Marnie -7 0 0/pause 500/speak Marnie "Oh, hello, Penny.$1"/pause 350/faceDirection Penny 2/faceDirection Shane 2/pause 500/speak Marnie "Jas isn't feeling well, so she won't go to class today.$3#$b#I'm sorry I didn't tell you earlier.$2"/pause 600/speak Penny "Really?$3#$b#Is she okay?$3"/pause 600/speak Marnie "Don't worry too much, she's fine.$0#$b#Just a little headache.$0"/pause 500/speak Penny "That's good.$0#$b#Then I'll leave now, I still have to go to Vincent's house.$0"/pause 500/speak Penny "See you tomorrow.$1"/pause 1000/end

Entries.59021016/f Clint 250/f Willy 250/t 1800: Saloon1/17 20/farmer 16 20 0 Shane 21 17 2 Pierre 20 19 3 Emily 15 18 2 Clint 19 23 3 Lewis 8 22 1 Gus 11 18 2 Marnie 7 22 3 Willy 1000 1000 0/skippable/animate Shane false true 150 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 21 22 23 24 24 24 24 23 22 21 20 20 20 20 20/animate Lewis false true 150 19 19 19 19 19 19 19 19 19 19 19 19 19 19 22 23 23 23/animate Marnie false true 150 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 21 22 22 23 23/animate Gus false true 250 18 19 20/pause 1800/playSound doorOpen/warp Willy 14 24/move Willy 0 -2 1/move Willy 4 0 2/pause 500/speak Clint "Hey, Willy.$0#$b#Long day at work?$0"/pause 600/speak Willy "Ahoy there, Clint.$0#$b#It was indeed.$0"/pause 500/speak Willy "Fishes on this valley keep gettin' harder to catch.$3"/pause 500/speak Willy "Maybe I should upgrade my fishing rods.$0"/pause 500/speak Willy "Last week I saw an ol' friend of mine.$0#$b#He told me there's this new material for fishing rods.$3"/pause 500/speak Willy "They said it appeals the fishes!$1"/pause 600/speak Willy "Doesn't @ explore the mines often?$0#$b#I should ask him about it.$0^I should ask her about it.$0"/pause 500/speak Willy "And you could also help me, you're the best blacksmith I know.$1"/pause 700/speak Clint "That'd be nice, I haven't had many clients lately.$0"/pause 500/speak Clint "But I'll charge you a fair price, of course.$1"/pause 600/speak Willy "There ain't a friends discount?$1"/pause 500/speak Clint "Well, I can invite you for a Mead.$1"/pause 600/speak Willy "I won't say no to that.$1"/pause 600/emote Clint 32/pause 500/speak Clint "Hey, Gus.$0#$b#Bring us one mead for Willy!$1"/pause 600/speak Gus "Coming!$0"/pause 1300/end

Entries.59021017/f Abigail 750/f Alex 750/t 1000: jaunty/6 22/Pierre 1000 1000 0 Alex -1000 1000 0 Abigail 4 23 2 farmer -1000 1000 0/skippable/pause 1650/playSound doorOpen/warp Alex 6 29/move Alex 0 -6 3/pause 500/faceDirection Abigail 1/pause 380/speak Abigail "Hey, Alex.$0#$b#Did you come to shop?$0"/pause 600/speak Alex "Hello, Abigail.$0#$b#Yeah, my grandparents weren't feeling well.$0"/pause 500/speak Alex "I just wanted some Kale and Salmon.$0"/pause 600/speak Abigail "Oh, my dad just left in a hurry.$0#$b#He said it was urgent."/pause 500/speak Abigail "You should come back later.$0"/pause 600/emote Alex 8/pause 500/speak Alex "But you're here, can't you help me?$2"/pause 500/emote Abigail 40/pause 500/speak Abigail "Uhm, actually...$9#$b#I don't have a clue of how things work at the shop, so I can't really help you.$9"/pause 600/emote Alex 28/pause 700/playSound doorOpen/warp Pierre 6 29/pause 250/speak Pierre "I'm back, Abigail.$1"/pause 350/move Pierre 0 -3 3/move Pierre -1 0 0/move Pierre 0 -1 0/pause 200/speak Pierre "Oh, how come you're here, Alex?$0"/pause 100/faceDirection Abigail 2/faceDirection Alex 2/pause 500/speak Abigail "Hi, dad.$0#$b#You're just in time, Alex came to buy some things.$0"/pause 500/speak Pierre "Oh, then come with me to the counter."/pause 350/speak Pierre "You can leave now, Abigail.$0"/pause 500/speak Abigail "Okay, bye, Alex.$1"/pause 500/emote Alex 32/pause 1000/end

Entries.59021018/f Alex 500/f Haley 500/t 1900 2: Saloon1/16 19/farmer 20 19 3 Shane 21 17 2 Emily 14 18 2 Clint 19 23 3 Willy 18 22 2 Gus 10 18 2 Lewis 8 22 1 Marnie 7 22 3 Alex 16 20 0 Haley 17 20 0/skippable/animate Shane false true 150 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 21 22 23 24 24 24 24 23 22 21 20 20 20 20 20/animate Gus false true 250 18 19 20/animate Lewis false true 150 19 19 19 19 19 19 19 19 19 19 19 19 19 19 22 23 23 23/animate Marnie false true 150 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 21 22 22 23 23/animate Willy false true 150 28 28 29 29 30 30 31 31/pause 1800/speak Alex "Gus's cooking is the best.$0#$b#Apart from my grandma, of course.$1"/pause 600/speak Haley "I know right?$0#$b#I often ask Emily for his recipes.$0"/pause 500/speak Haley "You know my cooking is great, but it just doesn't taste the same.$0"/pause 500/speak Haley "He must have some secret ingredient no one knows about.$0"/pause 600/speak Alex "I don't know much about it, grandma is the one that cooks.$0"/pause 600/speak Haley "It's actually pretty fun, especially when you cook with someone else.$1"/pause 800/speak Haley "I've an idea, why don't I go to your house some day?$0#$b#You know how much I like Evelyn's cookies. I'd love to learn her recipe!$1"/pause 500/speak Haley "And you could also learn some cooking.$0"/pause 600/speak Alex "That actually sounds cool.$0#$b#It'd be nice to help her around when she's busy.$0"/pause 600/speak Haley "Great! We'll have an amazing cooking class.$1"/pause 500/emote Alex 32/pause 1200/end

Entries.59021019/f Emily 500/f Harvey 500/w rain: kindadumbautumn/15 18/Harvey 1000 1000 0 farmer 20 19 3 Shane 21 17 2 Emily 12 18 2 Clint 19 23 3 Willy 18 22 2 Gus 16 18 2 Lewis 8 22 1 Marnie 7 22 3/skippable/animate Shane false true 150 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 21 22 23 24 24 24 24 23 22 21 20 20 20 20 20/animate Gus false true 250 18 19 20/animate Lewis false true 150 19 19 19 19 19 19 19 19 19 19 19 19 19 19 22 23 23 23/animate Marnie false true 150 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 21 22 22 23 23/animate Willy false true 150 28 28 29 29 30 30 31 31/pause 1000/playSound doorOpen/warp Harvey 14 24/pause 300/move Harvey 0 -3 3/move Harvey -2 0 0/move Harvey 0 -1 0/pause 500/speak Emily "Welcome, Harvey.$0#$b#It's nice to see you around, you don't come often.$0"/pause 500/speak Emily "Well, what can I get you?$1"/pause 600/emote Harvey 40/pause 500/speak Harvey "A glass of wine, please...$2"/pause 500/speak Emily "Oh, what's the matter? You don't look good.$2"/pause 600/speak Harvey "*sigh* I don't know... I've been feeling kind of down lately.$2"/pause 800/speak Harvey "I've always wanted to be a doctor, you know?$0"/pause 500/speak Harvey "Well, it's more like I was destined to be one.$0"/pause 500/emote Emily 8/pause 500/speak Harvey "You see, my parents and grandparents are all doctors.$0#$b#So I guess it was to be expected.$0"/pause 700/speak Harvey "They're all well-known and have accomplished many things.$0"/pause 900/speak Harvey "When I was a child I really looked up at them, and wanted to be like them.$0"/pause 800/speak Harvey "But now I think I'll never get on their level.$2#$b#I keep forgetting things and making silly mistakes...$2"/pause 800/speak Emily "Oh, come on, Harvey.$0#$b#You're one of the most hardworking persons I know.$0"/pause 500/speak Emily "I'm sure all that work will pay off.$1"/pause 500/speak Emily "Also, everyone makes mistakes, just don't blame yourself too much.$0"/pause 500/emote Harvey 60/pause 500/speak Harvey "Maybe you're right...$2"/pause 500/speak Harvey "My father did tell me he learned a lot from making mistakes.$0#$b#He also used to tell me to keep trying and never give up.$0"/pause 600/speak Emily "See?$0#$b#You should listen to his advices.$1"/pause 500/emote Harvey 32/pause 500/speak Harvey "Thank you for listening, Emily.$0#$b#You always know what to say.$1"/pause 700/speak Emily "No problem!$1#$b#I'll bring you the wine then.$1"/pause 1500/end

Entries.59021020/f Jodi 1000/f Kent 1000/y 2/d M: playful/6 5/Vincent 11 22 0 Kent 17 7 3 Jodi 6 5 0 farmer 1000 1000 0/skippable/animate Jodi false true 120 16 16 16 17 17 17/animate Vincent false true 150 18 18 18 19 19 19/pause 800/move Kent -11 0 0/move Kent 0 -1 0/pause 500/speak Kent "Uhm, Jodi...$0"/pause 300/stopAnimation Jodi/jump Jodi/shake Jodi 800/pause 200/faceDirection Jodi 2/pause 500/speak Jodi "Oh, jeez!$4#$b#You scared me, Kent.$4"/pause 500/speak Kent "I'm sorry...$0"/pause 500/speak Jodi "It's okay, don't worry.$0#$b#I didn't mean to shout to you.$2"/pause 500/speak Jodi "So, what did you want?$0"/pause 600/speak Kent "I saw you working out at Caroline's house last week.$0#$b#And I was wondering if I could go with you...$0"/pause 500/emote Jodi 8/pause 500/speak Kent "Oh, it's okay if you don't want to...$2#$b#I was just thinking doing some exercise would help me, I haven't been doing much since I returned.$2"/pause 500/speak Jodi "No, of course you can come with me!$0#$b#I was just surprised you asked me that.$1"/pause 500/speak Jodi "You're right, it'll be good for you to clear your mind.$0"/pause 500/speak Jodi "Now that I think about it, didn't you use to go running with Pierre?$0#$b#It's a shame he's so busy lately. Maybe you could ask Sam to go with you.$1"/pause 700/speak Jodi "Oh, look at the time, we're running late.$0#$b#Hurry up and get ready, I'll finish washing the dishes.$0"/pause 600/speak Kent "...$1"/pause 1000/end

Entries.59021021/f Lewis 750/f Evelyn 750/w sunn: breezy/6 17/farmer 1000 1000 0 Evelyn 3 17 0 George 15 23 0 Lewis 100 100 0/skippable/pause 1500/playSound doorOpen/warp Lewis 9 24/pause 250/move Lewis 0 -5 3/move Lewis -6 0 0/pause 500/speak Lewis "Good morning, Evelyn.$1"/pause 580/faceDirection Evelyn 2/pause 350/speak Evelyn "Oh, Lewis, it's so nice to see you.$1"/pause 500/speak Lewis "I came to ask you for help.$0"/pause 500/speak Lewis "Lately my plants look really sick, the leaves are turning brown.$2#$b#I watered them like you told me and also bought some fertilizer, but nothing is working.$2"/pause 600/speak Evelyn "Oh, dear, that's horrible!$2"/pause 500/speak Evelyn "I've already finished doing the chores, let's go right now and see what's wrong.$0"/pause 500/faceDirection Evelyn 1/pause 300/speak Evelyn "George, I'll leave for a moment.$0"/pause 500/speak George "Okay.$0#$b#Remember we have to go to the clinic later.$0"/pause 500/faceDirection Evelyn 2/speak Evelyn "Let's go, Lewis.$0"/globalFade .006/viewport -2000 2000/changeLocation Town/warp Lewis 57 88/faceDirection Lewis 1/warp Evelyn 56 88/faceDirection Evelyn 1/viewport 56 89/globalFadeToClear .007/viewport move 1 0 6000/pause 50/move Lewis 6 0 0/move Evelyn 6 0 0/pause 600/speak Lewis "See? The flowers look horrible.$2"/pause 600/speak Evelyn "Hmm...$0"/pause 700/animate Evelyn false true 300 17 18/pause 2500/stopAnimation Evelyn/pause 300/faceDirection Evelyn 1/pause 350/faceDirection Lewis 3/pause 380/speak Evelyn "Looks like the soil is poorly drained.$0#$b#Even if you're watering correctly, the roots are dry.$0"/pause 500/speak Evelyn "We should make a drainage hole and loosen the soil.$0"/pause 500/speak Evelyn "Do you have any compost? We should also apply a layer of it.$0"/pause 600/speak Lewis "Thank you for your help, Evelyn.$1"/pause 500/speak Lewis "Didn't you have to go to the clinic?$0#$b#I can take it from here, don't worry.$1"/pause 500/emote Evelyn 32/pause 500/move Lewis 2 0 0/move Lewis 0 -2 3/pause 300/animate Lewis false true 120 16 16 17 17 16 16 16 16 17 17 16 16 17 17 16 16/pause 350/move Evelyn -8 0 0/globalFade .007/viewport -1000 -1000/end
